sqlMap.select: SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NAME FROM IS_MENU WHERE UP_MENU_ID IS NULL OR UP_MENU_ID = '' ORDER BY MENU_ID ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #TXT_SEARCH_MENU_ID#, '%') AND MENU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #TXT_SEARCH_MENU_NAME#, '%')

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT MENU_ID, IFNULL(UP_MENU_ID, '') AS UP_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, IFNULL(SORT_ORDER, '0') AS SORT_ORDER, IF(USE_YN='Y', '사용', '미사용') AS USE_YN, PROGRM_URL, UPDUSR_SN, UPDT_DT, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM IS_MENU, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE MENU_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #TXT_SEARCH_MENU_ID#, '%') AND MENU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #TXT_SEARCH_MENU_NAME#, '%') ) A
WHERE A.RNUM >= #START_ROW# AND A.RNUM <= #END_ROW#
ORDER BY $sidx$ $sord$, SORT_ORDER ASC
SELECT a.UP_MENU_ID, a.MENU_ID, a.MENU_NAME, a.SORT_ORDER, a.PROGRM_URL, a.USE_YN, a.UPDUSR_SN, a.UPDT_DT FROM IS_MENU a WHERE a.MENU_ID = #TXT_MENU_ID#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO IS_MENU (MENU_ID, UP_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, PROGRM_URL, SORT_ORDER, USE_YN, UPDUSR_SN, UPDT_DT) VALUES (#TXT_MENU_ID#, #SLT_UP_MENU_ID#, #TXT_MENU_NAME#, #TXT_PROGRM_URL#, #TXT_SORT_ORDER#, #SLT_USE_AT#, #TXT_UPDUSR_SN#, SYSDATE() + 0)
SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM IS_MENU
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IS_MENU SET UP_MENU_ID = #SLT_UP_MENU_ID#, MENU_NAME = #TXT_MENU_NAME#, PROGRM_URL = #TXT_PROGRM_URL#, SORT_ORDER = #TXT_SORT_ORDER#, USE_YN = #SLT_USE_AT#, UPDUSR_SN = #TXT_UPDUSR_SN#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE() + 0 WHERE MENU_ID = #TXT_MENU_ID#
